[accessibility icon] The nearest accessible subway station connecting with the Q70-SBS is 61 St-Woodside [accessibility icon] [7]. 

For additional travel alternatives, plan your trip at mta.info, use the MTA app (download the app for iOS or Android), or check our Elevator & Escalator Status page.

What's happening?
We're replacing the elevators

Summary: Q101 buses are detoured in both directions because of downed power wires on Steinway St between Astoria Blvd and Ditmars Blvd.

While detoured, northbound buses will not make stops along Steinway St from 23rd Rd to 23rd Ave. Stops will be made as requested along Astoria Blvd S and Ditmars Blvd.
Southbound buses will not make stops along Steinway St from 23rd Ave to Astoria Blvd. Stops will be made as requested along 23rd Ave and Astoria Blvd N.

Summary: Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Description:
Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Queens Bus Network Redesign service improvements will be phased in by route on June 29 and August 31, 2025.

Until then, know that your bus route will still serve current stops, but some signs will reflect future service.

Use the MTA app or BusTime to plan your trip.

Learn more about the project at mta.info/queensbus
